class.name: ARVRPositionalTracker
class.description: An instance of this object represents a device that is tracked such as a controller or anchor point. HMDs aren't represented here as they are fully handled internally. As controllers are turned on and the AR/VR interface detects them instances of this object are automatically added to this list of active tracking objects accessible through the ARVRServer The ARVRController and ARVRAnchor both consume objects of this type and should be the objects you use in game. The positional trackers are just the under the hood objects that make this all work and are mostly exposed so GDNative based interfaces can interact with them.

method.name: get_hand
method.description: Returns the hand holding this tracker, if known. See TRACKER_* constants.

method.name: get_joy_id
method.description: If this is a controller that is being tracked the controller will also be represented by a joystick entry with this id.

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the controller or anchor point's name if available.

method.name: get_tracks_orientation
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this device tracks orientation.

method.name: get_tracks_position
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this device tracks position.

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Returns the transform combining this device's orientation and position.

members.member: The degree to which the tracker rumbles. Ranges from [code]0.0[/code] to [code]1.0[/code] with precision [code].01[/code].
